chronoMod:AdeptSpellcaster.NAME: Adept Spellcaster
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a cost X card, its effects are increased by #b

chronoMod:ArcaneBlessing.NAME: Arcane Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you consume Jade, your next Attack deals #b

chronoMod:BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive unblocked damage, Recall the amount of damage received as Block.

chronoMod:EternalForm.NAME: Eternal Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, you can choose to put a card from your discard pile into your hand. It costs #b

chronoMod:Inheritance.NAME: Inheritance
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Recall your unused energy.

chronoMod:Jade.NAME: Jade
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, consume 1 Jade and lose #b

chronoMod:Memento.NAME: Memento
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, you can choose to place #b
from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:Singularity.NAME: Singularity
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, upgrade the card for the rest of the combat.

chronoMod:SpellBoost.NAME: Spell Boost
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the effect of the next cost X card played this turn by #b

chronoMod:TemperedFate.NAME: Tempered Fate
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Gain 1 Jade when this effect triggers.

chronoMod:TemporalParadox.NAME: Temporal Paradox
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you spend at least 3 energy on a cost X card, gain #b

chronoMod:TidesOfTime.NAME: Tides of Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Weak to ALL enemies at the end of your turn if you have triggered a Recall effect this turn.

chronoMod:TimeDilation.NAME: Time Dilation
DESCRIPTIONS: Weak to enemies who intend to attack, and #b
Vulnerable to those who do not.

chronoMod:Willpower.NAME: Willpower
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next time you gain Jade.

chronoMod:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b
